墨.definition: ink stick; China ink; CL:塊|块[kuai4]; corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead

墨刑.definition: corporal punishment consisting of carving and inking characters on the victim's forehead

墨子.definition: Mozi (c. 470-391 BC), founder of the Mohist School 墨家[Mo4jia1], which flourished during the Warring States period (475-220 BC)

墨家.definition: Mohist School of the Warring States Period (475-220 BC), founded by the philosopher 墨子[Mo4 zi3]

墨斗.definition: carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)

墨水兒.definition: erhua variant of 墨水[mo4 shui3]

墨江哈尼族自治縣.pinyin: Mo4 jiang1 Ha1 ni2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
墨江哈尼族自治縣.definition: Mojiang Hani Autonomous County in Pu'er 普洱[Pu3 er3], Yunnan

墨江縣.definition: Mojiang Hani autonomous county in Pu'er 普洱[Pu3 er3], Yunnan

墨漬.definition: ink stain; ink blot; spot; smudge

墨爾缽.definition: see 墨爾本|墨尔本[Mo4 er3 ben3]

墨玉.definition: Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang

墨玉縣.definition: Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang

墨竹工卡.definition: Maizhokunggar county, Tibetan: Mal gro gung dkar rdzong in Lhasa 拉薩|拉萨[La1 sa4], Tibet

墨竹工卡縣.definition: Maizhokunggar county, Tibetan: Mal gro gung dkar rdzong in Lhasa 拉薩|拉萨[La1 sa4], Tibet

墨索里尼.definition: Benito Mussolini (1883-1945), Italian fascist dictator, "Il Duce", president 1922-1943

墨累達令流域.pinyin: Mo4 lei4 Da2 ling4 liu2 yu4
墨累達令流域.definition: Murray-Darling river system in the southeast of Australia

墨線.definition: inked line; carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)

墨翟.definition: original name of Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3]

墨西拿海峽.definition: Strait of Messina between Calabria and Sicily

墨跡.definition: ink marks; original calligraphy or painting of famous person
